edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.prefs

Interface BackingStoreAccessor<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of value to store/retrieve.

    public interface BackingStoreAccessor<V>
    Something that allows you to store and retrieve values of a specific type from the backing store used by Preferences.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V get(java.lang.String key)
      Gets a value of type V from the given node with the given key.
      void put(java.lang.String key, V value)
      Puts a value of type V at the given node with the given key.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get(java.lang.String key)
        Gets a value of type V from the given node with the given key. If the backing store is not available, should return null.

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String key,
       V value)
        Puts a value of type V at the given node with the given key.
